type.description: Type of service hour (Standard, Exception or Special).

exceptionHourType.description: Type of service hour exception type. Valid values are: Open or Closed.

validFrom.description: Date time where from this entry is valid.

validTo.description: Date time to this entry is valid.

monday.description: Is this service hour effective on monday.

tuesday.description: Is this service hour effective on tuesday.

wednesday.description: Is this service hour effective on wednesday.

thursday.description: Is this service hour effective on thursday.

friday.description: Is this service hour effective on friday.

saturday.description: Is this service hour effective on saturday.

sunday.description: Is this service hour effective on sunday.

opens.description: Opening time in format HH:mm for example 08:00.

closes.description: Closing time in format HH:mm for example 19:00
